```{r Part 1: reading in heart}
heart <- read.csv("heart.csv", header = TRUE, na.strings = "?")
summary(heart)
str(heart)
```

```{r changing to numeric/factor}
heart$sex <- as.factor(heart$sex)
summary(heart)
```

```{r}
fit_num_all <- lm(num ~ ., data=heart)
summary(fit_num_all)
```
